message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its exceptional quality and features, I'm confident it will meet your needs perfectly. I'm extending this exclusive opportunity to you at an introductory price of $150. This is a special offer tailored for you, considering the value this product can bring to your life.

Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate the value you're highlighting, but $150 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend right now. I'm interested in the product, but I'd be comfortable paying $100 for it. What do you think?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and appreciate your willingness to engage in the negotiation process. In light of your offer, I am pleased to counter with a price of $125. This reflects the value we place on the product while remaining competitive with your budget expectations. I hope this revised offer aligns better with your financial considerations and allows us to move forward with the transaction.
